review: Great product.  After opening the box we were up and running in 1/2 hour.  Very easy to use and is fast.  Downloaded the phone app, this also works very well.
author: A. C. Karlo

review: It was easy  to hook up and start I still have to play with it to see what ot does  ut I get netflix on a tv tthats not even hooked up to cable just  by Putting in my codes.  I am a bit disappointed that I will have to pay extra for certain programs.
author: dorothy koprowski

review: Plex streaming at 1080 is almost impossible. Skips. Would prefer the wired version by far. Or a forge TV
author: BGaulin

review: Very impressed with the easy set up and syncing with Fire HDX tablet. Love it!
author: Susan C

review: So easy to set up and great selection of shows!  Bought for a secondary TV.
author: Gina in Phx

review: It's great.  Better than expected.  Fast response, beautiful HD Picture.  Easy to use
author: Michael Hébert

review: My whole family loves the new Firestick!
author: Velma oliver

review: I wish there was better instructions.  I'm still having difficulty.
author: Connie Cole

review: I am not very smart with anything to do with technology, but I have put together this Fire TV Stick and right away was able to start watching PRIME Movies - way to go AMAZON - Satisfied customer  :)
author: Alba m Parra
